DOC.detailed_description: Participants study patient dermatology clinic clinically diagnose least 2X2 cm patch melasma side face ( forehead cheek ) . Starting 2 week treatment ( week 2 ) , side pretreated prim 4 % hydroquinone , necessary , 2.5 % hydrocortisone cream BID . On treatment day ( 2-weeks ) 6-weeks one half subject 's face receive glycolic acid peel half face receive 1064nm Q-switch laser . This study pilot study design determine feasibility procedure .
